dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: So, I hear April 1st is gonna be, like, super chill in Kazakhstan. Absolutely no deadlines or anything important to remember.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, I hear April first is gonna be, like, super chill in Kazakhstan. Absolutely no deadlines or anything important to remember.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: April 1, 2025 is the deadline for paying the transport tax for 2024.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh, no, A, that's, um, definitely not right. April 1st, 2025, is actually the transport tax deadline for 2024.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh, no, A, that's, um, definitely not right. April first, twenty twenty five, is actually the transport tax deadline for twenty twenty four.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: April 1, 2025 is the deadline for paying the transport tax for 2024.

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, joy. Another tax. And if you're late, I bet they just, like, send you a friendly reminder, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, joy. Another tax. And if you're late, I bet they just, like, send you a friendly reminder, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Those who are late with the payment will be charged a penalty daily. Tax authorities will send notifications to bailiffs. They, in turn, can seize property and bank accounts, restrict travel outside the country, prohibit loans, and so on.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, no, not exactly. They'll charge penalties daily. And then, uh, bailiffs can seize property or restrict travel.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, no, not exactly. They'll charge penalties daily. And then, uh, bailiffs can seize property or restrict travel.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Those who are late with the payment will be charged a penalty daily. Tax authorities will send notifications to bailiffs. They, in turn, can seize property and bank accounts, restrict travel outside the country, prohibit loans, and so on.

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, because seizing property for a late tax is totally reasonable. And then what, are mopeds suddenly cars now too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, because seizing property for a late tax is totally reasonable. And then what, are mopeds suddenly cars now too?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: From April 5, 2025, mopeds will be officially equated to mechanical vehicles in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: Actually, yeah, A. From April 5th, mopeds are officially equated to mechanical vehicles. You'll need to register them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Actually, yeah, A. From April fifth, mopeds are officially equated to mechanical vehicles. You'll need to register them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: From April 5, 2025, mopeds will be officially equated to mechanical vehicles in Kazakhstan. From this date, driving an unregistered moped will be considered a violation of the law.

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: Register a moped? What's the point? It's a moped. So, more bureaucracy. Anything else they're messing with?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Register a moped? What's the point? It's a moped. So, more bureaucracy. Anything else they're messing with?

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: Um, yeah, insurance. Remember the bonus-malus system changes from last April? Those are still affecting things.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Um, yeah, insurance. Remember the bonus-malus system changes from last April? Those are still affecting things.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Changes to the bonus-malus system for calculating the cost of compulsory motor third party liability insurance will come into force in Kazakhstan on April 7, 2024.

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: Insurance always changes. Is it ever for the better? I bet it's just gonna cost more for everyone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Insurance always changes. Is it ever for the better? I bet it's just gonna cost more for everyone.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the new rules, the insurance class will be affected not only by accidents, but also by gross violations of the rules recorded during the validity period of the insurance policy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, now gross violations, not just accidents, will affect your insurance class. So, uh, probably for those who drive badly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, now gross violations, not just accidents, will affect your insurance class. So, uh, probably for those who drive badly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the new rules, the insurance class will be affected not only by accidents, but also by gross violations of the rules recorded during the validity period of the insurance policy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: Or for anyone, if they decide it's a "gross violation." And what about Pavlodar Airport? Are they finally closing it for good?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or for anyone, if they decide it's a gross violation. And what about Pavlodar Airport? Are they finally closing it for good?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pavlodar airport will be closed for reconstruction from April 1 to November 1, 2025.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: No, it's closing for reconstruction from April 1st to November 1st, 2025. Runway expansion, building repairs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it's closing for reconstruction from April first to November first, twenty twenty five. Runway expansion, building repairs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Pavlodar airport will be closed for reconstruction from April 1 to November 1, 2025. The airport plans to carry out major repairs: reconstruction of the runway and its expansion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, "reconstruction." Probably just means more delays and, like, less comfortable travel.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, reconstruction. Probably just means more delays and, like, less comfortable travel.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: It's to ensure they get an airworthiness certificate for 2026. Oh, and mobile tariffs are going up too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's to ensure they get an airworthiness certificate for twenty twenty six. Oh, and mobile tariffs are going up too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Without reconstruction in 2026, the airport will not be able to receive an airworthiness certificate and accept flights. ... Mobile communications and Internet tariffs will increase again in Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: Shocker. Internet bills increasing? Like, that's new. I bet it's huge jumps.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Shocker. Internet bills increasing? Like, that's new. I bet it's huge jumps.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Kcell, from April 21, the cost of the archived tariff plan "Alga-1" will increase by 23.4% - from 2990 to 3690 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: Kcell's "Alga-1" plan, um, is increasing by 23.4%. Others are seeing 300 to 700 tenge hikes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kcell's Algaminus one plan, um, is increasing by twenty three point four percent. Others are seeing three hundred to seven hundred tenge hikes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Kcell, from April 21, the cost of the archived tariff plan "Alga-1" will increase by 23.4% - from 2990 to 3690 tenge. ... The increase in the cost of services, depending on the tariff, will be in the range of 300 to 700 tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: A
dialogue_turns.text: Of course they are. So, basically, less money in your pocket, more hassle, and, like, you can't even skip the country. Great.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Of course they are. So, basically, less money in your pocket, more hassle, and, like, you can't even skip the country. Great.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: They, in turn, can seize property and bank accounts, restrict travel outside the country, prohibit loans, and so on.

dialogue_turns.speaker: B
dialogue_turns.text: And, uh, children from six can apply for first grade starting April 1st.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And, uh, children from six can apply for first grade starting April first.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This year, the acceptance of applications for enrollment in the first grade will start on April 1 and will last until August 31. According to the law "On Education", children from 6 years old are enrolled in the first grade upon application from their parents.
